channel.title: toys on Fuzzy person's blog
channel.description: Recent content in toys on Fuzzy person's blog

item.title: Maglatch
item.description: Maglatch Github Link Itch.Io Link Information Art, Design, Code, Music by me. written in C, C++ (using Raylib library). Project Time: 2022-04-31 ~ 2022-05-02 About Pseudo Bullet-hell game with magnetic system, where the movement and attack are stuck into one. fight against the horde of enemies, keep the combo intact, never stop moving. Developed in 2 days for a ScorespaceJam #18, with the theme of Magnet. Ranked 31th place out of 123 entries.

item.title: Unnamed Scripting Language
item.description: Unnamed Scripting Language Github Link About Toy scripting language written in Rust, mainly as a learning experience and my own enjoyment. My own attempt of following Crafting Interpreter, a popular book for writing own toy interpreter. eventually I started to deviate from the book’s chapter, trying to implement a system in my own way.
